question: What was the basic objective of Indian National Congress when it was founded in 1885?
option1: To oppose the annexation of Upper Burma with India
option3: To secure greater share in government for educated Indians
option4: To hold Indian Civil Services Examination in India
answer: To secure greater share in government for educated Indians
explanation: To secure greater share in government for educated Indians. The basic objective was to secure the right of recruitment of Indians in the higher civil services under British Administration
